title: Test Scores: Top $1\%$
question_text:
In a large high school, the average test score is $22.4$ with a standard deviation of $3.1$. Ms. Johnsen’s class scored in the top $1\%$ of the school.
If Ms. Johnsen’s class has $35$ students in it, what is the minimum average her class could have scored to be in the top $1\%$?
